properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 11 at 2:53AM PST until February 11 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

- GENERAL SEAS...7 to 9 ft through Wednesday.

- FIRST EBB...Around 615 AM Tuesday. Seas to 12 ft.

- SECOND EBB...Very strong around 630 PM Tuesday. Seas to 14 ft
with breakers possible.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...Until 8 AM PST this morning and then from 4 PM this
afternoon to 9 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft especially
when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM PST THIS EVENING
